item.title: Natalie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Joseph Joubert
item.description: "The worst thing about new books is that they keep us from reading the old ones." -- Joseph Joubert

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Sticking feathers up your butt does not make you a chicken!" -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Tim Gunn
Natalie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I meant what I said and I said what I meant. An elephant's faithful one-hundred percent!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Sara Gruen
item.description: "I stroke her lightly, memorizing her body. I want her to melt into me, like butter on toast. I want to absorb her and walk around for the rest of my days with her encased in my skin. I lie motionless, savoring the feeling of her body against mine. I'm afraid to breathe in case I break the spell." -- Sara Gruen

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Ryan Buell
item.description: "If someone says there's a portal to hell under some rocks, you bet your ass I'm going to move them." -- Ryan Buell

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "The cops came by and said my nemesis had been poisoned, shot, stabbed, beaten, hung, drowned, and subjected to Gilbert Gottfried’s voice at a high decibel level. “Ah,” I said, “so you suspect his death was a suicide.” " -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket
